Translations.Text: Jevha tyanca bha'u nuha yanni sangitale, kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi rakhata
(Aika!) Mi tumacyakade allahaca visvasta rasula (paigambara) ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya balagale pahije ani majhe mhanane man'ya kele pahije
Ani mi tumacyakaduna tyabaddala konatahi mobadala icchita nahi. Majha mobadala tara kevala sarva visvanca palanakartyajavala ahe
Yastava tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
(Janasamuhane) uttara dile ki kaya amhi tumacyavara imana rakhave? Tumace ajnapalana karanare tara halakya pratice loka aheta
(Nuha) mhanale, mala kaya mahita ki purvi te kaya karita rahileta
Tyancya hisobaci jababadari tara majhya palanakartyavara ahe. Jara samaja balagata asala
Ani mi imana rakhanaryanna dhakke denara (jhidakaranara) nahi
Mi tara spastatah khabaradara karanara ahe
Te mhanale, he nuha! Jara tu he thambavale nahisa tara avasya tula dagadanca mara karuna thara kele ja'ila
(Nuha) mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Majhya janasamuhacya lokanni mala khote tharavile
Tevha tu, majhya ani tyancya daramyana niscitaca phaisala kara, ani mala va majhya imanadharaka sathidaranna mukti pradana kara
Yastava amhi tyala ani tyacya sathidaranna bharalelya nauketa (svara karuna) sutaka pradana keli
Maga tyanantara bakicya sarva lokanna amhi budavuna takale
Nihsansaya, yata motha bodha ahe parantu tyancyapaiki bahusankhya loka imana rakhanare navhateca
Ani nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta motha prabhavasali, dayavana ahe
